title: Dark Affection: A Freya Helland Novel
description: A tale of death, darkness, and desire. Freya Helland moved to Kentucky to take care of her ailing father. He is the only living family member she has left. After he passes, Freya decides to stay in Richmond to finish her studies. When her life seems to fall below enjoyment, Freya meets an alluring man named Desmond Hughes. Desmond takes Freya and her two best friends into an unknown supernatural world where an old battle lasting centuries between the vampires and demons thrive. In the mist of this war, Freya reaches out to save Desmondâ€™s lifelong friend, Aiden Knight. It doesn't take long for Freya to learn that she is more than a simple pawn in their world. Throughout the story she learns of new strengths that might be the key to ending the war.
author: Leela V. Rose
